title: Sunflower
lyrics: Ayy, ayy, ayy, ayy (Ooh) Ooh, ooh, ooh, ohh (Ooh) Ayy, ayy Ooh, ooh, ooh, ohh Needless to say, I keep it in check Callin' it quits now, baby, I'm a wreck (Wreck) Needless to say, I'm keeping her in check Callin' it quits now, baby, I'm a wreck Thinkin' in a bad way, losin' your grip Someone took a big L, don't know how that felt Ooh-ooh, some things you just can't refuse She wanna ride me like a cruise and I'm not tryna lose Then you're left in the dust unless I stuck by ya You're a sunflower, I think your love would be too much Or you'll be left in the dust, unless I stuck by ya You're the sunflower, you're the sunflower Every time I'm leavin' on ya (ooh), you don't make it easy, no, no Wish I could be there for ya, give me a reason to go Fightin' for my trust and you won't back down I know you're scared of the unknown (-Known) I know I always come and go (And go) But it's out of my contr ol
